mapper.select:
select t.name, t.id, (case when t.id = 'return' then t.value else count_num.value end) value
from (select app_status.name, app_status.id, return_num.value from (select '放款成功' as name, 'end' as id from dual union all select '审批中' as name, 'audit' as id from dual union all select '已审批' as name, 'approved' as id from dual union all select '退回' as name, 'returnedToFirst' as id from dual union all select '拒绝' as name, 'refuse' as id from dual) app_status left join (select count(0) as value, 'return' as id from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO cai inner join CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_PROCESS cap on cai.id = cap.application_id and cap.process_op_status = 'RETURNAPPROVE') return_num on return_num.id = app_status.id) t left join (select count(0) as value, app_info.status as id from customer_application_info app_info group by app_info.status) count_num on t.id = count_num.id

select '核销卡' name, count(0) value from CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_INFORMATION t where t.charge_logo = 1 union all select '有效卡' name, count(0) value from customer_card_information t where t.year = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') and t.month = to_char(sysdate, 'MM') and t.effective_status = 1 union all select '激活卡' name, count(0) value from customer_card_information t where t.year = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') and t.month = to_char(sysdate, 'MM') and t.activation_status = 1

select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='audit' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='一区') ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='audit' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='二区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='audit' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='三区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='audit' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='四区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='audit' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='后台')ttt

select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='approved' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='一区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='approved' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='二区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='approved' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='三区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='approved' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='四区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='approved' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='后台')ttt

select nvl(sum(REQLMT),0) as value from mibusidata union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata a where 1=1 and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata a where 1=1 and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and (wjfl3!=0 or wjfl4!=0 or wjfl3!=0)

select nvl(sum(REQLMT),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='一区' union all select nvl(sum(REQLMT),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='二区' union all select nvl(sum(REQLMT),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='三区' union all select nvl(sum(REQLMT),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='四区' union all select nvl(sum(REQLMT),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='后台'

select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='一区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='二区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='三区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='四区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='后台' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0)

select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='一区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and (wjfl3!=0 or wjfl4!=0 or wjfl3!=0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='二区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and (wjfl3!=0 or wjfl4!=0 or wjfl3!=0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='三区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and (wjfl3!=0 or wjfl4!=0 or wjfl3!=0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='四区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and (wjfl3!=0 or wjfl4!=0 or wjfl3!=0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='后台' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and (wjfl3!=0 or wjfl4!=0 or wjfl3!=0)

select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='audit' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='一区') ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='audit' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='二区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='audit' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='三区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='audit' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='四区')ttt

select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='approved' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='一区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='approved' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='二区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='approved' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='三区')ttt union all select nvl(sum(ttt.value),0) as value from (select tt.value, tt.instcode from (select count(*) as value, (select org.name from sys_organization org where id in(select t.org_id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = b.user_id))) as instcode from customer_application_info a, basic_customer_information b where status ='approved' and a.customer_id = b.id group by b.user_id)tt where tt.instcode ='四区')ttt
select sum(mm.REQLMT) from (select distinct(m.YWBH), m.REQLMT from mibusidata m) mm
select distinct(m.YWBH),m.loandate as name,m.reqlmt as value from mibusidata m where m.userid=#{userId}

select sum(cc.dkye+cc.bnqx+cc.bwqx) from (select dkye,bnqx,bwqx from mibusidata where ( DELAYINTERESTDAYS not in ('0') and DELAYINTERESTDAYS is not null) or( DELAYAMTDAYS not in ('0') and DELAYAMTDAYS is not null)) cc

select allsp.e as id, nopaa.a as name ,nosq.b as value,bcak.c as value1,succwss.d as value2 from (select count(*）as a from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO where (status='refuse'or status='nopass'))nopaa, (select count(*）as b from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO where status='audit')nosq, (select count(*）as c from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO where (status='returnedToFirst'or status='nopass_replenish')) bcak, (select count(*）as d from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO where (status='approved'or status='end')) succwss, (select count(*）as e from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO where (status='approved'or status='end' or status='returnedToFirst'or status='nopass_replenish' or status='refuse' or status='nopass')) allsp

with circle as ( SELECT * FROM (select distinct tkmx.YWBH , b.id as id , b.KHH, b.KHMC, b.ZJHM, rygl.SSBM, b.SJ, b.SXED, b.GHJL, tkmx.JKRQ as LOANDATE, tkmx.DQRQ, tkmx.DKQX, tkmx.JZLL, tkmx.FFJE as REQLMT, (case when(to_date(max(lsz.jzrq),'yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date(tkmx.dqrq,'yyyy-mm-dd')) > 0 then (to_date(max(lsz.jzrq),'yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date(tkmx.dqrq,'yyyy-mm-dd')) else null end ) as DELAYINTERESTDAYS, (case when(to_date(max(lsz.jzrq),'yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date(tkmx.dqrq,'yyyy-mm-dd')) > 0 then (to_date(max(lsz.jzrq),'yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date(tkmx.dqrq,'yyyy-mm-dd')) else null end )as DELAYAMTDAYS, max(lsz.jzrq) as DLAYDT, yehz.SHBJ, yehz.JKJE, yehz.KSQXRQ, yehz.SHLX as PAYDEBT, yehz.DKYE, yehz.BNQX, yehz.BWQX, yehz.DKYE as BALAMT , yehz.dkye as yxye, sysuser.id userid, sysuser.display_name, ( select org.name from SYS_ORGANIZATION org where org.id in (select t.ORG_ID from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt where tt.user_id = sysuser.id))) as YWJG from ty_repay_tkmx tkmx, ty_customer_base b, ty_customer_rygl rygl, sys_user sysuser, ty_kdk_jh jh, ty_repay_yehz yehz, ty_repay_lsz lsz where b.khjl=rygl.dm and rygl.ddrq=sysuser.external_id and b.khnm=tkmx.khh and jh.ywbh=tkmx.ywbh||'HT' and yehz.jjh=tkmx.jjh and tkmx.jjh =lsz.jjh group by tkmx.YWBH ,b.id ,b.KHH,b.KHMC, b.ZJHM,rygl.SSBM, b.SJ, b.SXED, b.GHJL,tkmx.JKRQ , tkmx.DQRQ, tkmx.DKQX,tkmx.JZLL, tkmx.FFJE , yehz.SHBJ,yehz.JKJE, yehz.KSQXRQ,yehz.SHLX, yehz.DKYE,yehz.BNQX, yehz.BWQX,yehz.DKYE , yehz.dkye , sysuser.display_name, sysuser.id order by tkmx.jkrq) )
select nvl(sum(REQLMT),0) as value from circle where YWJG ='一区' union all select nvl(sum(REQLMT),0) as value from circle where YWJG ='二区' union all select nvl(sum(REQLMT),0) as value from circle where YWJG ='三区' union all select nvl(sum(REQLMT),0) as value from circle where YWJG ='四区' union all select nvl(sum(REQLMT),0) as value from circle where YWJG ='后台'

select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='一区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='二区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='三区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='四区' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) union all select nvl(sum(DKYE+BNQX+BWQX),0) as value from mibusidata where YWJG ='后台' and (nvl(DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0)
